name: Summarize
description: Accepts any text and returns a concise summary. Handles documents up to 100,000 words. Returns plain text, not markdown. Optimized for meeting transcripts and legal documents but works on anything.

input.description: The text to summarize. Any length up to 100k words.

output.description: A concise summary, typically 10-20% of the original length.

examples.input: The quarterly earnings report showed a 12% increase in revenue...
examples.output: Revenue grew 12% with margins expanding to 34%. Management raised full-year guidance.
